task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI

plannerResult.raw_task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI

subtasks.name: agent-shell
subtasks.objective: Set up a minimal frontend shell for the Tasks UI, including app entry, page layout, header, and main content region placeholders.

subtasks.name: agent-list
subtasks.objective: Implement core Tasks UI components with mock data: task list, task item row, add-task input, and basic local state interactions.

subtasks.name: agent-style
subtasks.objective: Add lightweight responsive styling and UX states (empty state, loading placeholder, hover/focus styles) for a clean scaffolded interface.
